titles.title: Social Security Bipartisan Commission Study bill
Comprehensive Entitlement Reform Commission Act of 2005
A bill to establish the Comprehensive Entitlement Reform Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 10/19/2005--Introduced. Comprehensive Entitlement Reform Commission Act of 2005 - Establishes the Comprehensive Entitlement Reform Commission to review Social Security, Medicare, and Medicaid and make comprehensive recommendations to sustain the solvency and stability of these three programs for future generations.
